td.span: The district is receiving regular updates and recommendations from the MN Department of Health. As we receive updates and recommendations, Click on a link below to read the update.

span.span: Link on this link for the latest information from MDH:
To educate and inspire all learners to reach their full potential.

Information located on these web pages are designed to better inform parents, students and our community members about activities, programs, and functions of the District. Compiling information for this website is on on-going process. If there is something that you would like to see us share via this site, please contact Principal Mary Yakibchuk or Superintendent John McDonald.
